46188.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『呻』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of "moan. It is the voice
that tells of unbearable suffering.

46189.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『呼』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of "call". It is the voice
that calls out to others and connects them.

46190.「ここは シエラ巡礼地。\n かつては シェルナーと呼ばれる者が\n 五声の祈り:
This is the Sierra Pilgrimage Site. This is the place where the person called Shellner used to offer a five-voice prayer. If you want
to follow in the footsteps of Shellner, how about visiting the five sites with your own feet and Say a Prayer in five voices?

46191.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『歌』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of song. It is the voice
that puts words into sound and connects our thoughts.

46192.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『言』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of "Kotoba. It is the
voice that expresses my thoughts in words, and is the voice that I speak.

46193.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『哭』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of wailing. It is the
voice that conveys the sorrow that cannot be expressed in words.

46194.「ここは シエラ巡礼地。\n かつては シェルナーと呼ばれる者が\n 五声の祈り:
This is the Sierra Pilgrimage Site, where a
man called Shellner used to offer a five-voice
prayer.

78838.「ここは シエラ巡礼地。\n かつては シェルナーと呼ばれる者が\n 五声の祈り:
This is the Sierra Pilgrimage Site, where the Shellner used to offer up a five-voice prayer. The five voices are the power of our voices.
In other words, it is the expression of our five thoughts: "call," "say," "sing," "wail," and "moan. The sites of the Five Voices are
scattered throughout the Sierra Pilgrimage Site. Pilgrims seek the Five Voices with their own feet and become Shellners after the
ritual. Five Priests who will convey the Five Voices. One of them will convey the Song.

46195.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『歌』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of song. It is the voice
that puts words into sound and connects our thoughts. If you want to pray with the five voices, you must listen to the story of
Nafuna, Shellner's guide, at the entrance of the pilgrimage site.

78839.「私は 五声の教えを今に伝える者。\n<br>\n「五声のひとつ 『歌』の声。\:
I am the one who carries the teachings of the Five Voices to the present. One of the five voices is the voice of song. It is the voice
that puts words into sound and connects our thoughts.
